content: this pattern is for a beautiful crochet coaster mia in english this coaster is reversible and looks the same on both sides the pattern uses the side saddle stitch the pattern includes 1 written instructions in us terms 2 abbreviations used 3 links to the photo tutorials on my website www nordichook com for all the stitches used in this project 4 pattern notes 5 photo instructions showing the main steps how to make this coaster materials and tools you will need any thin yarn i used järbo 8/4 100% cotton mercerized & gassed 50 g color grey crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used size 2 0 tapestry needle measurements 9 0 x 9 0 cm you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/crochet-coaster-mia 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/ copyright information this pattern remains the copyright of nordic hook it is for personal use only not to be copied distributed or sold you may create items using this pattern and sell them with credit to nordic hook copyright 2021 © nordic hook nordic hook information website https //nordichook com/ facebook https //www facebook com/nordichook/ pinterest https //www pinterest dk/nordichook/ instagram https //www instagram com/nordic_hook/
